0.name: Void
0.description: How did you even get this?

1.name: Conveyor
1.description: Conveyor that is used for basic item transport.

2.name: Crossing Conveyor
2.description: Conveyor that can be used as a crossing for two other conveyors.

3.name: Splitting Conveyor (to right)
3.description: Conveyor that is used to split items. Outputs items to the front and right.

4.name: Splitting Conveyor (to left)
4.description: Conveyor that is used to split items. Outputs items to the front and left.

5.name: Sorting Conveyor (to right)
5.description: Conveyor that is used to sort items. Outputs the selected item to the right.

6.name: Sorting Conveyor (to left)
6.description: Conveyor that is used to sort items. Outputs the selected item to the right.

7.name: Highway Conveyor
7.description: Conveyor that is used to transport items quickly. Faster than a normal coneyor.

8.name: Cable Bending
8.description: Transports packages containing items efficiently. Cable track starts at cable sender and ends at the reciever.

9.name: Cable Bending
9.description: Transports packages containing items efficiently. Cable track starts at cable sender and ends at the reciever.

12.name: Farm
12.description: A basic farm which produces tomatoes, carrots and potatoes.

13.name: Forest
13.description: A forest which produces sticks, logs with leaves and logs without leaves.

14.name: Barn
14.description: A farm which produces eggs, wool and milk.

15.name: Crafter
15.description: Can be used to craft things. Unlock (more) recipies to craft in the research menu.

16.name: Cable Sender
16.description: Sends out packages every few seconds. Start of the cable line.

17.name: Cable Reciever
17.description: End of cable line. Unpacks cargo items and outputs the items in four directions (not all have to be used) which have to be conveyors.

18.name: Cable
18.description: Transports packages containing items efficiently. Cable track starts at cable sender and ends at the reciever.

33.description: A mine which produces hard rocks, smooth stones and normal stones.

35.name: Mineral Mine
